recipe.description: If specified, modifies the result item of the recipe that matches the specified namespace and ID.
recipe.markdownDescription: If specified, modifies the result item of the recipe that matches the specified namespace and ID.

item_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the result item of a recipe.
item_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the result item of a recipe.

item_action_after_crafting.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the result item of a recipe after crafting the said recipe.
item_action_after_crafting.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the result item of a recipe after crafting the said recipe.

entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the player upon crafting a recipe.
entity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the player upon crafting a recipe.

block_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the block used for crafting a recipe.
block_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the block used for crafting a recipe.

item_condition.description: If specified, the item from the `result` field and the specified actions will only be applied if this condition is fulfilled by the result item of a recipe.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the item from the `result` field and the specified actions will only be applied if this condition is fulfilled by the result item of a recipe.

result.description: If specified, this item will replace the item of a recipe.
result.markdownDescription: If specified, this item will replace the item of a recipe.

type.description:
## Modify Crafting

---



[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_crafting)

Modifies the result item of a recipe that can be crafted via the player's inventory or the crafting table.

Type ID: `origins:modify_crafting`



---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "origins:modify_crafting",
    "recipe": "minecraft:wooden_sword",
    "result": {
        "item": "minecraft:diamond_sword"
    }
}
```

This example will replace the result item stack from the `minecraft:wooden_sword` (`data/minecraft/recipes/wooden_sword.json`) vanilla recipe with a Diamond Sword only for the player that has the power.
